full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI CHOS SKOR LAS, BLA BLU'I CHO GA RIN CHEN SROG GI CHAD MTHUD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B BLA BLU'I CHO GA RIN CHEN SROG GI CHAD MTHUD ZHES BYA BA 'DI BLA 'GUGS DGOS PA 'GA' ZHIG GI SKABS, ,LAG TU BZA' BTUNG GI RIGS ZHIG THOGS TE, ,@009A *, ,MING NAS KYI 'BOD PA BZHIN BYED PA LAS, ,BYA THABS GZHAN MI SHES PA MANG PO MTHON POS RKYEN BYAS TE, ,MDOS GTO GLUD KYI CHO GA 'DI RIGS SDE SNOD LA SPYANGS PA'I DGE BSHES RNAMS 'GAL RKYEN MED CING LTO 'GRANGS NYI MAS DROS PA'I SKABS SPANGS BYA DANG, ,NAD GDON SOGS KYIS GTZES DUS BLANG BYAR MDZAD PAS, ,SPANGS BLANG GANG GI PHYOGS YIN PA MA SHES KYANG, ,RMA KHAR PHAN NA KHYI TSIL GYI DPE BZHIN, ,NYE BAR MKHO BA'I SKABS KYANG SRID SNYAMS TE BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYIS YID DGA' CHOS 'PHEL ZHES BYA BA'I SKYED MOS TSAL DU BRIS PA'O,, ,,
